title: Strengthening Business Practical Skills: Pedagogical Integration of Computational Thinking and Robotics for Early Childhood Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will design three computing thinking activities (algorithm design, pattern recognition, problem decomposition) suitable for each stage of early childhood development (sensorimotor, preoperational, concrete operational) and demonstrate the ability to achieve an average of 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale during expert reviews.
Design project-based learning (PBL) classes utilizing robotics tools
Propose MOOC content development strategies considering learner-instructor, learner-content, and learner-learner interactions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
